summary: IEE (International Employment Ecosystem) - A workforce platform connecting verified workers with employers for daily wage and skilled jobs. Web-based version with worker/employer profiles, job posting and matching, QR codes for worker identification, ratings system, and basic admin dashboard.
architectural_notes: Web-based platform using Motoko backend and React TypeScript frontend
QR code generation and scanning for worker identification and attendance
Distance-based job matching algorithm prioritizing verified workers with high reliability scores
Two primary user roles: Worker and Employer, plus Admin dashboard
Platform designed for scalability from city-level to national-level expansion
Trust and security focus with unique Worker IDs and fraud detection capabilities
Monetization through per-hire service fees, bulk hiring contracts, and subscription plans
known_issues: Cannot implement mobile app with Flutter/React Native - web-only platform
Cannot integrate external databases like PostgreSQL/MongoDB - limited to Motoko backend storage
Cannot implement SMS/WhatsApp services - no external messaging integration available
Cannot implement real-time GPS tracking or live location features
Cannot implement OTP-based authentication with external SMS services
Cannot implement push notifications (Firebase or similar)
Cannot implement document upload and storage for ID verification (Aadhar/Labor ID)
Cannot implement selfie verification or image processing
Cannot implement payment processing or payroll integration
Cannot implement cloud hosting on AWS/GCP - deployed on Internet Computer

existing_features.title: Create worker authentication system with profile creation including fields for name, mobile number, unique auto-generated Worker ID, skills selection (multi-select), experience level, availability toggle, preferred wage range, and location input
Generate and display unique QR code for each worker based on their Worker ID that can be used for identification and attendance tracking
Create employer authentication system with company profile setup including fields for company name, contact person, mobile number, company type, and location

Build job posting system for employers to create single or bulk job listings with fields for required skill, wage amount, duration, shift timing, number of workers needed, job location, and job description
Create job discovery interface for workers showing nearby job listings with filters for distance, wage range, and duration, with ability to accept or reject job offers and view real-time job status
Build QR-based attendance tracking system where employers can scan worker QR codes for check-in and check-out, with work history tracking and job completion records stored per worker

Implement rating and reliability score system where employers can rate workers after job completion on a 5-star scale with optional remarks, and calculate cumulative reliability score based on ratings, attendance history, and job completion rate
Create payment tracking interface for workers showing payment status for each completed job, earning history with date and amount, and total earnings summary

Build employer workforce management dashboard showing list of hired workers, live attendance status for current jobs, ability to request worker replacement, and workforce analytics including total hires, completion rates, and average ratings

Create admin dashboard with system-wide metrics including total workers registered, active employers count, total jobs posted, job fill rate percentage, average time to fill jobs, worker retention rate, and employer retention rate

Implement employer job candidate review interface showing matched workers for each job posting with their reliability scores, skills, and distance, with ability to confirm worker slots and view auto-fill suggestions for bulk hiring

Design modern, professional, and minimal user interface with intuitive navigation optimized for ease of use, using a clean color scheme that avoids blue and purple, with large touch targets and clear typography suitable for users with varying literacy levels
